Love the CK boxers but they are really tight if you are endowed with an average or above average package. They will shrink down a size after the first wash so I regret not ordering up a size to compensate for material shrinkage and then the lack of room in the pouch. My shaft and balls are always slipping out of these boxers so I really should have ordered one size up but you never know how things fit these days until you try it I guess.
